name: Eclipse Lite
desc: When a skill comes off cooldown, gain a temporary barrier for 1% (+0.25% per stack) of your maximum health per second of the skill's base cooldown.
notes:
The Eclipse Lite is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Alloyed Collective expansion.
Whenever any of the user's skills come off cooldown, they gain barrier equal to 1% (+0.25% per stack) of their maximum health per second of the skill's base cooldown.


== Notes ==
Regaining charges of a skill through  Backup Magazines,  Hardlight Afterburner, and  Lysate Cell does not apply barrier.
Survivors that naturaly have extra charges to their skills (  Acrid's leaps,   Railgunner's mines,  False Son's spikes) can recharge barrier simultaniously.
It takes around 11 Eclipse Lites to combat natural barrier decay on its own.
  Bandit's Burst and Blast will not give barrier when reloading the barrel.


== Tips ==
  Mercenary can utilize the barrier gain very well due to his low skill cooldowns and   Expose  reducing them further.
  Drifter's   Trash to Treasure passive can make Eclipse Lite more effective by reducing her skill cooldowns while she is holding  Item Scrap, Yellow.
 Brainstalks allows you to gain large amounts of barrier as skills recharge quickly.
 Bandolier will activate Eclipse Lite for every skill on cooldown.
Reducing skill cooldowns through  Purity and  Alien Head is recommended, as getting skill charges don't give barrier and leave more time for skills to stay off cooldown, reducing barrier gains.
  Hungering Gaze grants a large amount of barrier when it reloads. This interaction may be unintended.

== Trivia ==
Eclipse Lite was originally named "Gup Gulp" during development.
This is why the item creates orange splat particles when it activates.
"It's full of electrolytes! It's what thirsty soldiers on alien planets crave!" Is a reference to the movie "Idiocracy".
